items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t remember whether or not he\'d locked the door.
First of all, I\'m very worried about my daughter\'s health.
We need to decide what\'s important and what\'s unimportant.
Tom would\'ve been unable to do that if Mary hadn\'t helped.
When I was in Boston, I\'d play tennis with Tom quite often.
His mother said that he had been sick in bed for five weeks.
I think I shouldn\'t make a decision without consulting Tom.
I think I\'ll be able to solve the problem without any help.
I didn\'t realize that Tom didn\'t have a driver\'s license.
Tom had difficulty convincing Mary to go the dance with him.
